name: Dani Arthur
bio: Dani is a software engineer with a passion for open-source projects and community building.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained the front end of the company website using React.
Collaborated with designers to create a seamless user experience.
Optimized web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for the company's flagship product.
Worked with databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
Wrote unit and integration tests to ensure code quality.
Assisted in the development of a new mobile application.
Participated in daily stand-ups and sprint planning meetings.
Gained experience with agile development methodologies.
